gw.api.webservice.messagingTools

Class MessagingToolsBase

  • gw.api.webservice.messagingTools.MessagingToolsBase

  • public class MessagingToolsBase
    MessagingToolsBase provides administration level tools that work with the messaging subsystem.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String API_NAME

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      MessageOptionalFields acknowledgeMessage(Acknowledgement ack)

      void configureDestination(int destID, int timeToWaitInSec, Integer maxretries, Long initialretryinterval, Integer retrybackoffmultiplier, Integer pollinterval, Integer numsenderthreads, Integer chunksize)

      ExternalDestinationConfig getConfiguration(int destID)
      This will return the current configuration of this destination.
      long getMessageId(String senderRefID, int destinationID)
      Gets the message id for a message with a specific sender ref id and a specific destination id. If the destination id passed in is -1, then this would find messages from any destination that matches the sender ref id. Returns -1 if no message is found that has given sender ref id and destination id. If there are multiple messages that match, this will return the first one.
      Long getMessageIdBySenderRefId(String senderRefID, int destinationID)
      Gets the message id for a message with a specific sender ref id and a specific destination id. If there are multiple messages that match, this will throw an exception.

      Gets all the message statistics of a given destination and safe ordered object.
      MessageStatisticsData getTotalStatistics(int destID)
      Gets all the message statistics of a given destination.
      void purgeCompletedMessages(Calendar cutoff)
      Purges the message table of completed messages. Deletes messages in Acked, ErrorCleared, Skipped or ErrorRetried state with send time less than supplied before date.
      void purgeCompletedMessages(Date cutoff)
      Purges the message table of completed messages. Deletes messages in Acked, ErrorCleared, Skipped or ErrorRetried state with send time less than supplied before date.
      void resumeDestination(int destID)
      Resumes the destination with the specified destination id
      boolean resumeDestination(int destID, MessageProcessingDirection direction)
      Resume outbound or inbound message processing depending on the specified direction. When outbound processing is resumed, this resumes the request and transport plugins, and resumes message sending. When inbound processing is resumed, the reply plugin is resumed
      boolean retryMessage(long messageID)
      Retries a single message (retryable error or inflight).
      boolean retryRetryableErrorMessages(int destID, int retryLimit)
      Retries messages in retryable error state for the given destination where the message has previously been retried fewer than retryLimit times. Each message maintains a retry count; attempts to retry the message increment the retry count. If there are messages whose retry count >= retryLimit, they will not be retried.

      Specifying a retryLimit of 0 retries all retryable error messages, and is identical to retryRetryableErrorMessages(int destID).
      boolean retryRetryableErrorMessages(int destID)
      Retries all messages in retryable error state for the given destination.
      boolean retryRetryableErrorMessagesForCategory(int destID, ErrorCategory category)
      Retries messages in retryable error state and of the specified error category for the given destination.
      boolean skipMessage(long messageID)
      Skips a single message (error or inflight).
      void suspendDestination(int destID)
      Suspends the destination with the specified destination id
      boolean suspendDestination(int destID, MessageProcessingDirection direction)
      Suspend inbound or outbound processing for the destination depending on the specified direction. When outbound processing is suspended, the request and transport plugins are suspended, along with message sending. When inbound processing is suspended, the reply plugin is suspended Returns true if processing was previously active and is now suspended. Returns false if processing was already suspended.
      void validateDestination(int dest)
      validates that the destination is valid

      • ackMessage

        boolean ackMessage(Acknowledgement ack)
        Acknowledges message
        Parameters:
        ack - The acknowledgement to report
        Returns:
        true if the acknowledgement succeeded, false otherwise. the acknowledgement may not have succeeded if the message identified by the specified id does not exist.

      • acknowledgeMessage

        MessageOptionalFields acknowledgeMessage(Acknowledgement ack)
        Acknowledges message
        Parameters:
        ack - The acknowledgement to report
        Returns:
        optional message fields that can be set

      • configureDestination

        void configureDestination(int destID,
                        int timeToWaitInSec,
                        Integer maxretries,
                        Long initialretryinterval,
                        Integer retrybackoffmultiplier,
                        Integer pollinterval,
                        Integer numsenderthreads,
                        Integer chunksize)
        This will change the configuration of a destination and then stop and restart that destination
        Parameters:
        destID - The destination id of the destination to suspend
        timeToWaitInSec -
        maxretries - the number of retries on failure
        initialretryinterval - the interval before starting the retry
        retrybackoffmultiplier - the further retry timing
        pollinterval - the polling interval
        numsenderthreads - the number of sender threads
        chunksize - the chunksize

      • getConfiguration

        ExternalDestinationConfig getConfiguration(int destID)
        This will return the current configuration of this destination.
        Parameters:
        destID - the destination to retrieve
        Returns:
        the external configuration

      • getMessageId

        long getMessageId(String senderRefID,
                int destinationID)
        Gets the message id for a message with a specific sender ref id and a specific destination id. If the destination id passed in is -1, then this would find messages from any destination that matches the sender ref id. Returns -1 if no message is found that has given sender ref id and destination id. If there are multiple messages that match, this will return the first one.
        Parameters:
        senderRefID - The sender ref id for the message we want to get
        destinationID - The destination id for the message we want to get. -1 would match all destination ids.
        Returns:
        message id, or -1 if message is not found

      • getMessageIdBySenderRefId

        Long getMessageIdBySenderRefId(String senderRefID,
                             int destinationID)
        Gets the message id for a message with a specific sender ref id and a specific destination id. If there are multiple messages that match, this will throw an exception.
        Parameters:
        senderRefID - The sender ref id for the message we want to get
        destinationID - The destination id for the message we want to get.
        Returns:
        message id, or null if message is not found.

      • getMessageStatisticsForSafeOrderedObject

        MessageStatisticsData getMessageStatisticsForSafeOrderedObject(int destID,
                                                             String safeOrderedObjectId)
        Gets all the message statistics of a given destination and safe ordered object.
        Parameters:
        destID - The destination to get the message statistics.
        safeOrderedObjectId - The public id of the safe ordered object of interest
        Returns:
        the message statistics for the specified destination and safe order object

      • getTotalStatistics

        MessageStatisticsData getTotalStatistics(int destID)
        Gets all the message statistics of a given destination.
        Parameters:
        destID - The destination to get the message statistics.
        Returns:
        the message statistics for the specified destination

      • purgeCompletedMessages

        void purgeCompletedMessages(Calendar cutoff)
        Purges the message table of completed messages. Deletes messages in Acked, ErrorCleared, Skipped or ErrorRetried state with send time less than supplied before date.
        Parameters:
        cutoff - Remove messages with send time less than this date.

      • purgeCompletedMessages

        void purgeCompletedMessages(Date cutoff)
        Purges the message table of completed messages. Deletes messages in Acked, ErrorCleared, Skipped or ErrorRetried state with send time less than supplied before date.
        Parameters:
        cutoff - Remove messages with send time less than this date.

      • resumeDestination

        void resumeDestination(int destID)
        Resumes the destination with the specified destination id
        Parameters:
        destID - The destination id of the destination to resume

      • resumeDestination

        boolean resumeDestination(int destID,
                        MessageProcessingDirection direction)
        Resume outbound or inbound message processing depending on the specified direction. When outbound processing is resumed, this resumes the request and transport plugins, and resumes message sending. When inbound processing is resumed, the reply plugin is resumed
        Parameters:
        destID - the destination to suspend
        direction - inbound (0) or outbound (1)
        Returns:
        true if processing was previously suspended and is now resumed, false if processing was already active.

      • retryMessage

        boolean retryMessage(long messageID)
        Retries a single message (retryable error or inflight).
        Parameters:
        messageID - The message to retry.
        Returns:
        Returns whether or not the message was successfully retried. If the message with this messageID does not exist, this returns false. If the message is not a retryable error message or an inflight message, this returns false. Returning true does not necessarily mean that the retry was successful; it just means that the message was retried.

      • retryRetryableErrorMessages

        boolean retryRetryableErrorMessages(int destID,
                                  int retryLimit)
        Retries messages in retryable error state for the given destination where the message has previously been retried fewer than retryLimit times. Each message maintains a retry count; attempts to retry the message increment the retry count. If there are messages whose retry count >= retryLimit, they will not be retried.

        Specifying a retryLimit of 0 retries all retryable error messages, and is identical to retryRetryableErrorMessages(int destID).

        Parameters:
        destID - The destination that should be retried.
        retryLimit - Retry only messages with retryCount < retryLimit; if retryLimit is 0, retry all messages.
        Returns:
        Returns true if all messages were successfully retried; false if any errors occurred.

      • retryRetryableErrorMessages

        boolean retryRetryableErrorMessages(int destID)
        Retries all messages in retryable error state for the given destination.
        Parameters:
        destID - The destination that should be retried.
        Returns:
        Returns true if all messages were successfully retried; false if any errors occurred.

      • retryRetryableErrorMessagesForCategory

        boolean retryRetryableErrorMessagesForCategory(int destID,
                                             ErrorCategory category)
        Retries messages in retryable error state and of the specified error category for the given destination.
        Parameters:
        destID - The destination that should be retried.
        category - the error category of the retryable error message
        Returns:
        Returns true if all messages were successfully retried; false if any errors occurred.

      • skipMessage

        boolean skipMessage(long messageID)
        Skips a single message (error or inflight).
        Parameters:
        messageID - The message to skip.
        Returns:
        Returns whether the message was successfully skipped. If the message with this messageId does not exist, this returns false. If the message is not in an active state(active states are: pending send, inflight, error, retryable error and pending retry), this returns false.

      • suspendDestination

        void suspendDestination(int destID)
        Suspends the destination with the specified destination id
        Parameters:
        destID - The destination id of the destination to suspend

      • suspendDestination

        boolean suspendDestination(int destID,
                         MessageProcessingDirection direction)
        Suspend inbound or outbound processing for the destination depending on the specified direction. When outbound processing is suspended, the request and transport plugins are suspended, along with message sending. When inbound processing is suspended, the reply plugin is suspended Returns true if processing was previously active and is now suspended. Returns false if processing was already suspended.
        Parameters:
        destID - the destination to suspend
        direction - inbound (0) or outbound (1)
        Returns:
        true if processing was previously active and is now suspended, false if processing was already suspended.

      • validateDestination

        void validateDestination(int dest)
        validates that the destination is valid
        Parameters:
        dest - the destination to validate
